#summary How to contact the developers of Sequel Pro
#labels Featured

The best way to contact the developers for questions/comments about Sequel Pro is via sequelpro@mjmedia.com.au.

You can also follow any progress we make on [http://www.twitter.com/sequelpro twitter], or talk to us directly on IRC by joining #sequel-pro at irc.freenode.net.

If you have feature requests or bug reports you can also contact us by email, but it's preferable to add tickets to the [http://code.google.com/p/sequel-pro/issues/list Issues Tracker].
